org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement

Class PendingReplicationBlocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.PendingReplicationBlocks

  •  class PendingReplicationBlocks
extends Object
    PendingReplicationBlocks does the bookkeeping of all blocks that are getting replicated. It does the following: 1) record blocks that are getting replicated at this instant. 2) a coarse grain timer to track age of replication request 3) a thread that periodically identifies replication-requests that never made it.
